name: Dannik Jerriko
Lore: 'Anzati assassin. Cheek-folds hide proboscises which allow him to ''eat the soup'' (consume the life Force) of his victims. Smokes t''bac. Currently working for Jabba.',
Text: 'Once per battle, may use 1 Force to ''eat the soup'' of (place out of play) one opposing non-droid character just lost or forfeited at same site. * Power = 1 + total ability of all victims whose soup was eaten.',
